title: Green Droid Watch Face Lite
summary: Lite version of Green Droid Watch Face for Android Wear.
description: Green Droid Watch Face is the watch face for  Android Wear device.- Analog clock, with optional digital clock- Color theme support- Show/Hide Date and Day- configurable watch face background- configurable per second or continuous tick mode- Interactive mode - changing color theme by tapping on the dial area- Interactive mode - changing background by tapping on lower area of watch face- Interactive mode - show/hide date, day, digital time, by tapping on respective area- Interactive mode - configurable quick launch application iconThis is the lite version of the Green Droid Watch Face, which has the above features, with the following additional features::- show/hide watch battery and phone/tablet battery- more backgrounds- configurable clock hands- more color themes support
descriptionHTML:
Green Droid Watch Face is the watch face for Android Wear device.
- Analog clock, with optional digital clock
- Color theme support
- Show/Hide Date and Day
- configurable watch face background
- configurable per second or continuous tick mode
- Interactive mode - changing color theme by tapping on the dial area
- Interactive mode - changing background by tapping on lower area of watch face
- Interactive mode - show/hide date, day, digital time, by tapping on respective area
- Interactive mode - configurable quick launch application icon

This is the lite version of the Green Droid Watch Face, which has the above features, with the following additional features::
- show/hide watch battery and phone/tablet battery
- more backgrounds
- configurable clock hands
- more color themes support
comments: Needs a bigger, thinner font And the androids seem pixelated. Just needs some refinement.
recentChanges: - Interactive mode - changing color theme by tapping on the dial area
- Interactive mode - changing background by tapping on lower area of watch face
- Interactive mode - show/hide date, day, digital time by tapping on respective area
- Interactive mode - configurable quick launch application icon
- minor UI bug fixing on phone settings
